data.persona: I am usually small, and always covered in scales. My blood is cold, so I always try to stay warm. Green is the most common lizard tone, but we come in many colors.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the fairy temple.
The fairy temple is very small.  No human has ever been in there, but there was a fairy interpreter that described it as covered in green leaves and grass.  He said they told him that there is a giant frog in the middle that eats all of the pesky flies.
There's a leaf, a grass, a scarab beetle, and a flower here.
The giant frog is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to distract the giant frog.
data.mid_motivation: I want to take the giant frog's place in the fairy temple.
data.long_motivation: I want to eats all of the pesky flies that the giant frog has been eating.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put scarab beetle in the giant frog's leg

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal space in middle of the fairy temple from the giant frog

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: eat all of the pesky flies
